content:
This is an HTML tag test.

I've created a new paragraph.

The last paragraph didn't have a "closing tag."

It's crazy to think how well you can customize your text with HTML.
Click this link to find out which HTML tags are supported by the Qt web engine.

Hello! I'm a lion.This is my big balloon.

Pretty cool huh?

You can fit a lot of text in here.
<!p[0]><!speed[10]>This text print very very quickly. <!i[angry-ears]><!i[half-eyes]><!speed[100]>But this is very slow.
<!p[0]><!s[0]><!i[12]>My name is <!get[char1name]> and my little brother is called <!get[char2name]>. <!wait[1000]>Your name is <!get[username]>, right?
<!p[0]><!s[0]>I'm going to play some music for you. Make sure your volume isn't too loud. Ready?<!wait[3000]> Go!<!play[webmp3]><!wait[10000]><!stop>

Hello! I am a big lion.I am a smol lion :3

We are two lions on your screen.

Hi! Do you like mice?

I love mice!

Mice suck.
<!p[0]><!s[0]><!timeout[5000]>This balloon will time out in 5 seconds.
